definition: to estimate/to fine (archaic)/variant of 資|资[zi1]

sentences.english: But keeping libraries running costs big money.
sentences.chinese: 但是讓這些圖書館的運行也所費不貲。

sentences.english: Experts say implementing a new currency symbol can be an expensive exercise.
sentences.chinese: 專家們稱推廣新的貨幣符號可能所費不貲。

sentences.english: If you want this antique, I can sell it to you, but it will cost a bundle.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要這件古董，我可以賣給你，不過所費不貲。
